#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
typedef pair< int , int > pii;
typedef long long LL;
#define fr first
#define se second
#define EPS 1e-8
#define INF 10000*10000*10000LL
stringstream ss;
#define two(x) ( 1LL<<x )
LL mod = 1000000007LL;

/**************************Code****************************/


int main()
{
	int t, n, m;
	scanf( "%d", &t );
	while( t -- )
	{
		scanf( "%d%d", &n, &m );
		LL b = ( n * 1LL * m ), a = b / 2;
		LL g = __gcd( a, b );
		a /= g, b /= g;
		cout << a << "/" << b << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
